name: RelationshipTipoftheDay
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Do they need to communicate better? Is it time to get the love you want? Relationship advice for men and women! 

Seanlai, America's Relationship Strategist helps you build healthy relationships; and keep your current relationships strong and happy! 

You know how awful it is to be in a toxic unhealthy relationship! Don't be in one! 
You need more than people saying: "He/She needs to....blah blah blah" 

You need STRATEGIES- (WHAT to say, HOW to say it, WHEN to say it)! You feel me on this?!

Healthy relationships share certain characteristics! Enable this skill and let's do this! 

It's time to get Expert Relationship help by America's only alternative relationship strategist. 

How to ENABLE ALEXA SKILL: 
Open your Alexa app
Tap “More” on the bottom navigation bar
Tap “Skills & Games”
Tap the "Magnifying Glass 🔎" on the top right
Type: "Relationship Tip of the Day"* 
Tap “Enable To Use”

Then go to your Alexa and say: "Alexa, play my flash briefing"

*To see all Seanlai's Shows "Seanlai"

Want more? Message Seanlai at relationshiptipoftheday@gmail.com

This flash briefing will work on all Alexa Echo devices, Alexa enabled Kindle Fires and you can listen in the car on the Alexa app on your mobile phone or tablet.

This flash briefing Alexa skill works great on:
Alexa Echo App
Alexa app for Kindle Fire
Amazon Echo Show (all)
Amazon Echo Spot
Amazon Echo (all)
Amazon Echo Dot (all)
Fire TV Stick with Alexa Voice Remote (all)
Amazon Fire Tablets (all)

FEEDBACK
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
